description: Returns the nodes and health info of a service
name: health_service

consul_profile.description: Consul profile to use to run the action.

dc.description: The datacenter of the node and defaults to this agents datacenter.

index.description: The current Consul index. Useful to check for changes since last query was run.

near.description: A node name to sort the resulting list in ascending order based on the estimated round trip time from that node.

node_meta.description: An optional meta data used for filtering.

passing.description: Set to True will filter results to only those nodes whose checks are currently passing.

service.description: Name of the service to query in Consul.

token.description: An ACL token to use instead of the agent token.

wait.description: Maximum duration to wait (e.g. '10s') to retrieve a given index.
